titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 454) to improve the organization and procedures of the Department of Defense for the acquisition of major weapon systems, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 454) to improve the organization and procedures of the Department of Defense for the acquisition of major weapon systems, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-125, by Ms. Pingree (ME).

The resolution provides for consideration of the conference to accompany S.454. The resolution waives all points of order against the conference report and against its consideration and provides that the conference report shall be considered as read. The resolution provides that the Chair may postpone further consideration of the conference report to such time as may be designated by the Speaker.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 58.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 463.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 454) to improve the organization and procedures of the Department of Defense for the acquisition of major weapon systems.
